Title: [u'MS. Heb. d. 75/20']
Name: [u'Arabic letter from (?) \u05de\u05d5\u05e1\u05d9 \u05d1\u05df \u05d0\u05d1\u05d5 \u05d0\u05dc\u05d7\u05d9 to \u05d0\u05d1\u05d5 \u05d9\u05d7\u05d9\u05d9 \u05e0\u05d4\u05e8\u05d0\u05d9 \u05d1\u05df \u05e0\u05e1\u05d9\u05dd \u05e0\u0307\u05e2\u0307.']
Physical description: [u'Syr\u200e.\u200e curs\u200e.\u200e char\u200e.\u200e\u200e;\u200e paper \u200e,\u200e \u200e1\u200e\u200e0\u200e \u200e1\u200e\u200e/\u200e\u200e2\u200e x \u200e7\u200e \u200e1\u200e\u200e/\u200e\u200e8\u200e in\u200e.\u200e\u200e,\u200e stained and obliterated\u200e.\u200e ']
Acquisition: [u'Bought through J. Offord in 1906. From the Genizah.']
Mentions: [u"Musa b. Abi 'l-\u1e24ayy", u'Nahrai b. Nissim (Abu Ya\u1e25ya)']

Title: [u'MS. Heb. c. 28/34']
Name: [u'Business letter, in Arabic']
Acquisition: [u'Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).']
Mentions: [u"Musa b. Abi 'l-\u1e24ayy", u'Abu Sa\u02bfid Joseph b. Musa, of Tihert', u'Jeshua', u'Jonah', u'Joseph b. Musa, of Tihert', u'Nahrai b. Nissim (Abu Ya\u1e25ya)']
Notes: [u'from \u05de\u05d5\u05e1\u05d9 \u05d1\u05df \u05d0\u05d1\u05d5 \u05d0\u05dc\u05d7\u05d9 \u05e0\u0307\u05e2\u0307  to \u05d0\u05d1\u05d5 \u05e1\u05e2\u05d9\u05d3 \u05d9\u05d5\u05e1\u05e3 \u05d1\u05df \u05de\u05d5\u05e1\u05d9 \u05e0\u0307\u05e2\u0307 \u05ea\u05d9\u05d4\u05e8\u05ea\u05d9 \u200e.\u200e He came from Alexandria\u200e.\u200e A letter was delivered to him by \u05e8\u0307 \u05d9\u05d5\u05e0\u05d4  from \u05e8\u0307 \u05e0\u05d4\u05e8\u05d0\u05d9 \u200e.\u200e He mentions \u05e8\u0307 \u05d9\u05e9\u05d5\u05e2\u05d4 \u200e.\u200e No date\u200e.\u200e ']

Title: [u'MS. Heb. d. 66/6']
Name: [u'Letter, in Arabic']
Acquisition: [u'Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).']
Languages: [u'The main language is Judeo-Arabic. Other languages included: Arabic.']
Mentions: [u"Joseph b. Abi 'l-faraj b. Abi 'l-barakat", u"Abu 'l-faraj b. Abi 'l-barakat", u"Abu 'l-\u1e25asan b. Abi 'l-barakat"]
Key Words: [u"Joseph b. Abi 'l-faraj b. Abi 'l-barakat. Letter.", u'Letters. Arabic.']

Title: [u'MS. Heb. d. 66/40']
Name: [u'Business letter, in Arabic']
Acquisition: [u'Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).']
Mentions: [u"Abu Ibrahim b. Abi 'l-\u1e24ayy", u"Musa b. Abi 'l-\u1e24ayy", u"Abu \u02bfImran Musa b. Abi 'l-\u1e25ayy"]
Key Words: [u"Abu Ibrahim b. Abi 'l-\u1e24ayy. Letter.", u'Letters. Arabic.', u"Musa b. Abi 'l-\u1e24ayy. Letter."]

Title: [u'MS. Heb. d. 66/87']
Name: [u'Letter, in Arabic']
Acquisition: [u'Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).']
Mentions: [u"Abu 'l-ridha, brother of Meir", u"Meir, brother of Abu 'l-ridha"]
Key Words: [u"Abu 'l-ridha, brother of Meir. Letter.", u'Letters. Arabic.']
Notes: [u'from \u05d0\u05db\u05d5\u05d4 \u05d0\u05d1\u05d5 \u05d0\u05dc\u05e8\u05e6\u0307\u05d9  to \u05e8\u0307 \u05de\u05d0\u05d9\u05e8 \u200e,\u200e dated at the end Marheshwan 20th, 151, i. e. 5151 A.M.  \u200e=\u200e 1391 A.D. ']
